Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    ActionToken
    This interface represents a single ActionToken for the Solo game.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    BlueMarble
    This class represents a specific type of Marble, the BlueMarble.
    Cell
    This class represents a Cell of the Faith Track.
    DevelopCard
    This class represents a DevelopCard that can be bought by a player or discarded in the Solo game.
    DevelopDeck
    This class represents a DevelopDeck, a deck of DevelopCards of a certain color and level.
    DiscardToken
    This class represents a specific type of ActionToken, the DiscardToken.
    FaithLeader
    This class represents a FaithLeader, a leader card which has as requirement the player's faith marker to be at a certain position.
    FaithMarker
    This class represents a FaithMarker.
    FavorTile
    This Class represents a FavorTile which can be found on the FaithTrack.
    Game  
    GameTest  
    GreyMarble
    This class represents a specific type of Marble, the GreyMarble.
    LeaderCard
    This abstract class represents the blueprint of any LeaderCard.
    LeaderDeck
    LeaderDeck class represents the leader deck used in the game.
    LeaderDevelopCard  
    LeaderDevelopCardTest  
    LevTwoLeader
    LevTwoLeader represents a LevTwoLeader, a leader cards which has as requirement owning a level 2 development card of a certain color.
    Marble
    This abstract class represents a generic Marble that has a method action() redefined by the classes that implements it.
    MarbleTest
    This class tests the classes that implements the Marble interface
    Market
    This class represents the Market where a player can get the resources
    MarketTest
    This class tests the Market class.
    MoveandShuffleToken
    This class represents a specific type of ActionToken, the MoveandShuffleToken.
    MoveToken
    This class represents a specific type of ActionToken, the MoveToken.
    OneAndOneLeader
    This class represents a OneAndOneLeader, a leader card which has as requirement owning two development cards of two different colors.
    OneOfAllLeader
    This class represents a OneOfAllLeader, a leader card which has as requirement owning a development card of all colors.
    PersonalBoard  
    PersonalBoardTest  
    Player
    This class represents a Player of the game "Maestri del Rinascimento".
    PlayerTest  
    PurpleMarble
    This class represents a specific type of Marble, the PurpleMarble.
    RedMarble
    This class represents a specific type of Marble, the RedMarble.
    ResourceAmount
    This class represents the amount of a certain color of Resource.
    ResourceAmountTest
    ResourceAmountTest class tests ResourceAmount class.
    ResourceLeader
    This class represents a ResourceLeader, a leader card which has as requirement owning an amount of resources of a certain color in the deposits.
    SoloActions
    This class represents the ActionTokens' array used in the Solo game.
    SoloGame  
    SoloGameTest  
    TwoAndOneLeader
    This class represents a TwoAndOneLeader, a leader card which has as requirement owning two development cards of a certain color and a development card of another color.
    WhiteMarble
    This class represents a specific type of Marble, the WhiteMarble.
    YellowMarble
    This class represents a specific type of Marble, the YellowMarble.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    Color
    Enum that lists the colors of the Resources.
    GamePhase
    Enum used to distinguish the different phases of the game
